title: 求教，怎么用Waterfall跨forge官服
author: dark4
txt_content:
现在一跨官服就显示
[22八月2020 09:37:35.699] [Netty Server IO #4/ERROR] [net.minecraftforge.fml.network.NetworkRegistry/NETREGISTRY]: Channels [mmorpg:main_channel,citadel:main_channel,mutantbeasts:main,curios:main,autoreglib:main,forgeendertech:main,immersiveengineering:main,storagenetwork:main_channel,rats:main_channel,patchouli:main,uteamcore:network,botania:chan,minersadvantage:main_channel,watersource:main] rejected vanilla connections
[22八月2020 09:37:35.700] [Netty Server IO #4/INFO] [net.minecraftforge.fml.server.ServerLifecycleHooks/SERVERHOOKS]: Disconnecting VANILLA connection attempt: This server has mods that require Forge to be installed on the client. Contact your server admin for more details.

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content:
思路：
①.升级为最新版本https://papermc.io/downloads#Waterfall

②.打开forge支持forge_support: true复制代码


③.配置好端口数据

replies.author: dark4
replies.txt_content:
水煮清娃 发表于 2020-8-22 13:24
思路：
①.升级为最新版本https://papermc.io/downloads#Waterfall
这些我都做了，
已经是最新版了，forge支持已经开了，端口数据没问题
